# Getting data

```{r}
stations <- c(
  "Parque D.Pedro II",
  "Mooca",
  "Ibirapuera",
  "São Caetano do Sul",
  "Congonhas",
  "Cerqueira César",
  "Osasco",
  "Taboão da Serra",
  "Pinheiros",
  "Parelheiros",
  "Cid.Universitária-USP-Ipen"
  )

stations_ids <- filter(koffing::cetesb_station_ids, stationname %in% stations)

carbon_id <- 
  koffing::cetesb_param_ids %>%
  filter(param_abbrev == "CO") %>% 
  select(id) %>% 
  purrr::flatten_dbl()


Rpollution::scraper_CETESB(
  station = stations_ids$id[1],
  parameter = carbon_id,
  star = ""
  
)
```
